queries.description: Nested switch labels can lead to unstructured code.
queries.name: Nested switch labels shall not be used.

RULE-16-2.title: A switch label shall only be used when the most closely-enclosing compound statement is the body of a switch statement

queries.description: An unterminated switch-clause occurring at the end of a switch statement may fall into switch clauses which are added later.
queries.name: An unconditional break statement shall terminate every switch-clause

RULE-16-3.title: An unconditional break statement shall terminate every switch-clause

queries.description: The requirement for a default label is defensive programming.
queries.name: Every switch statement shall have a default label

RULE-16-4.title: Every switch statement shall have a default label

queries.description: Locating the default label is easy when it the first of last label.
queries.name: A default label shall appear as either the first or the last switch label or a switch statement

RULE-16-5.title: A default label shall appear as either the first or the last switch label of a switch statement
